email_sequence.subject: Rep productivity study results
email_sequence.body:
Hi {{first_name}},

Furniture rep performance study: Top 20% use digital tools 8-12x daily. Bottom 20% use them less than 2x daily.

Hooker Furniture gained visibility into rep activity - improved bottom quartile performance by 45%.

How do you currently track rep engagement?

{{sender_name}}

email_sequence.subject: Hooker Furniture case study
email_sequence.body:
{{first_name}},

Hooker Furniture's rep performance results:

- 45% improvement in underperformer productivity
- 23% reduction in rep turnover
- Early warning system for at-risk reps

Their VP Sales calls it 'game-changing visibility.'

Interested in their approach?

{{sender_name}}

email_sequence.subject: Industry turnover costs
email_sequence.body:
{{first_name}},

National Furniture Rep Association data: Average replacement cost per rep is $47,000.

Company with similar profile reduced turnover from 31% to 19% using performance analytics.

ROI was 340% in year one.

Worth exploring?

{{sender_name}}

linkedin_sequence.message: Hi {{first_name}}, noticed you work with sales reps - saw some interesting performance benchmarking data you might find valuable.
{{first_name}}, thanks for connecting! What trends are you seeing in your sales operations lately?

optimization_notes: Moderate pain - focus on education and ROI demonstration
Highlight performance tracking and coaching capabilities
